name: DMT Diafold Combination Fine/Coarse Sharpener
description: This combination coarse- and fine-grit diamond whetstone can quickly sharpen even the dullest knives to a keen edge. The sharpener is manipulated with a plastic handle, which doubles as a sheath. A compact and versatile sharpener that is good for general use and excellent for extended backcountry trips.Made of diamond, steel, and plastic.Length is 24cm open and 12.7cm closed.
